name: FOFA 2018
description:
A regular foothuman game made for the 1st Mad Jam

Controls:

Purple:

  • WASD to move
  • G to dash
  • F to change players

Green

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • P to dash
  • O to change players

Game works with gamepads, for xbone controller:

  • A to change players
  • Right Button to dash

Have Fun!

Made By

Mut - Programming and Game Design - https://twitter.com/ghust1995

Koshino - Art and Game Design - https://www.instagram.com/koshasnc

Renan - Peludo - Audio and Game Design- https://www.twitch.tv/zpeludo

Bluesday - Pedro Guilherme Marodin - Art and Game Design - https://www.behance.net/bluesday

Most of the 3d assets can be found here: https://poly.google.com/user/6hSSLzz6Scz
